constructor.details: This constructor is called by the `HyperLiquidOFT` contractPost deployment, this address needs to be approved (via approveCaller) by the `owner` of the `HyperLiquidOFT` contract to call the `transferToHyperLiquidL1` function

params._coreIndexId: The core index id of the HyperLiquid L1 contract
params._oft: The OFT contract address associated with this composer
params._weiDiff: The difference in decimals between the HyperEVM OFT deployment and HyperLiquid L1 HIP-1 listing

lzCompose(address,bytes32,bytes,address,.details: This function is called by the OFTCore contract when a message is sent

params._message: The encoded message content, expected to be of type: (address receiver).
params._oft: The address of the OFT contract.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to send
params._isOFT: Whether the amount is an OFT amount or a HYPE amount

returns._0: _amounts The amount of tokens to send to HyperCore, dust, and the swap amount

lzCompose(address,bytes32,bytes,address,.notice: Composes a message to be sent to the HyperLiquidLZComposerThis function is the only new addition to the OFT standard

quoteHyperCoreAmount(uint256,bool).notice: Quotes the amount of tokens that will be sent to HyperCoreThis function is externally callable
